ing: 1 pound dried black-eyed peas, sorted and rinsed
1 red bell pepper, stemmed, seeded, and diced
des: "Enjoy this easy crock pot recipe that's perfect for pot luck dinners and barbecues."
ins: Pour the water into a slow cooker, add the bouillon cube, and stir to dissolve. Combine the black-eyed peas, onion, garlic, bell pepper, jalapeno pepper, ham, bacon, cayenne pepper, cumin, salt, and pepper; stir to blend. Cover the slow cooker and cook on Low for 6 to 8 hours until the beans are tender.
